about_the_game:
In a loosely norse mythology inspired fantasy metroidvania, assume the role of Rye Brynfire, a shut-in elf girl grown up in solitude with her blacksmith father in a city still wounded from war years ago. Lacking any connections other than a single passing friend, and a higher purpose in life, she spends her days practicing magics in her attic bedroom in secrecy, waiting for a day when she'll have the courage to finally experience the wider world.



On one particular night, as Rye's only friend sets out for another journey, Rye finally gathers the courage necessary to chase after her. However, she wakes up the following morning on the ground, her home city leveled, turned into an ashen wasteland covered in beautiful daisies, her friend dead. All she can remember is a catching a strange man attacking and interrogating her friend. With only a handful of leads and her friend's spear, she sets out to find the one responsible to shove the sharp end into his heart.





Acquire countless new abilities and secrets, as you unravel the many mysteries connected to your lineage and own personal history, finally blooming into your own person. Explore the world and meet its many inhabitants, befriending them, as you uncover deeper roots of mysteries intertwined underneat the surface. Acquire new magics and hone your skills to accomplish your one wish!





In 'A Field of Flowers', you can find many magics written on the pages of a book of fairytales, and multiple new techniques for wielding your spear. No matter what you choose to wield, it's certain it'll help you accomplish your wish.

content_descriptors.notes: 'A Field of Flowers' contains some blood, general violence, and includes themes that might not be suitable for all ages.

short_description: In this norse-inspired metroidvania, explore and seek truths of what truly happened to you, having lost your home and your only friend in a single night. Fight and copy new magic from others to gain power, as you swear revenge on a mysterious stranger that took everything from you.
